DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of V505 in comparison to GARDASIL (TM)
DOC.brief_title: Broad Spectrum HPV (Human Papillomavirus) Vaccine in 16 to 26 Year Old Women (V505-001)
DOC.criteria: Female between 16 to 26 years old Has never had Pap testing or have only had normal Pap test results Lifetime history of 0 to 4 sexual partners History of an abnormal cervical biopsy result; History of a positive test for HPV; History of external genital/vaginal warts; Currently a user of any illegal drugs or an alcohol abuser History of severe allergic reaction that required medical attention Are pregnant Received a marketed HPV vaccine Currently enrolled in a clinical trial Currently has (or has a history of) certain medical conditions or is currently taking or has taken certain medications (details will be discussed at time of consent)
